name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior CDEngineer with extensive expertise in Continuous Delivery and Continuous Integration (CD/CI) utilizing tools such as **Jenkins**, **GitLab CI**, **Azure DevOps**, and **CircleCI** to enhance software deployment efficiency. Skilled in automation through **Ansible** and **Terraform**, adept at container orchestration using **Kubernetes**, and proficient in programming languages including **Python**, **Bash**, and **PowerShell**. Strong background in quality assurance frameworks such as **pytest**, **GoogleTest**, and **Allure**. With 9+ years of experience, I excel in debugging, troubleshooting, and collaborating across teams to drive project success. Additionally, I have a solid foundation in developing scalable, user-centric applications using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and modern frontend frameworks like **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**, particularly in the healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, **AWS CodePipeline**, and **Terraform**, achieving a **80%** reduction in deployment times while ensuring high-quality code delivery.
Automated environment provisioning and configuration management with **Ansible** and **Terraform**, leading to a more efficient setup process and reducing manual errors.
Developed and maintained containerized applications using **Docker** and managed orchestration with **Kubernetes**, achieving **99.9%** uptime across services.
Conducted extensive debugging and troubleshooting in **Linux** and **Windows** environments, improving system reliability by **25%**.
Collaborated effectively within cross-functional teams, enhancing communication on deployment strategies and operational challenges, resulting in a **30%** improvement in team efficiency.
Applied **Python** scripting to automate routine tasks, reducing time spent on manual processes by **40%**.
Executed testing strategies using **pytest** and **GoogleTest**, ensuring code quality and functional correctness, with a defect density of less than **0.5%**.

• Implemented **CI/CD** processes via **Jenkins** and integrated version control with **GitLab CI** to enhance deployment efficiency by 30%.
• Automated infrastructure management using **Terraform** and coordinated between **AWS** services to maintain optimal uptime of **99.9%**.
• Utilized **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, improving scalability and resource management by 40%.
• Developed robust backend services using **Python** and incorporated testing frameworks like **pytest** to ensure high-quality code deliveries with a defect rate below 2%.
• Created Bash and PowerShell scripts for system automation, reducing manual operational tasks by 50%.
• Participated in cross-functional teams, enhancing communication and collaboration by implementing Agile methodologies, leading to a project turnaround time cut by **15%**.

• Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins**, **GitLab CI**, and **Azure DevOps**, streamlining deployments and increasing efficiency by 25%.
• Automated infrastructure management with **Terraform** and **Ansible**, resulting in a 40% reduction in provisioning time.
• Collaborated cross-functionally, utilizing strong **communication** skills to ensure seamless integration of new features and timely project delivery.
• Conducted thorough testing with **pytest** and **GoogleTest**, achieving a bug reduction of 30%.
• Engaged in **debugging** and **troubleshooting** strategies on both **Windows** and **Linux** platforms, enhancing system reliability.
• Leveraged **Kubernetes** for orchestrating containerized applications, improving scalability and deployment times by 15%.
• Implemented effective monitoring and reporting using **Allure** and **TestRail** to track project progress and quality metrics.
